heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T gets sick of the USA where there are too many misers and goes to Russia to spend money on vodka with people and have a good time.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T gets sick of the USA where there are too many misers and goes to Russia to spend money on vodka with people and have a good time.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " people " to " me " sound. The original meaning is tilt. "Shu Wen": "Russian, Xing are also. From people, my voice. "Poetry" said: "Zheng Bian of Russia." Duan Yucai thought that there is no " Xing " word. It’s just to add "walking" ears. This is right now." And "Guang Ya. Interpretation of the Second": "Russian, 衺 also." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Bin Zhi Chu Yan": "Russia on the side, dances repeatedly." Zheng Xuanjian: "Russian, beautiful appearance." "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi "Guitian Fu": "Yu Shiyao Lingrujing, to Wangshu."

" Russia " also means a moment's time. Such as "Zhuangzi. Grand Master: "Oerzi came to be sick, panting and dying, and his wife cried in circles." "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Literature": "The hand does not stop writing, and Russia gets seven pieces of paper, which is extraordinary."

Modern Chinese is also used as an abbreviation for "Russia" or "Russia".
humanum_short_description_en: From " person " to " me " sound. The original meaning is tilt.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「我」聲。本義是傾斜。《說文》：「俄，行頃也。从人，我聲。《詩》曰：仄弁之俄。」段玉裁以為無「行」字，注：「各本作『行頃』，乃妄加『行』耳。今正。」又《廣雅．釋詁二》：「俄，衺也。」如《詩．小雅．賓之初筵》：「側弁之俄，屢舞傞傞。」鄭玄箋：「俄，傾貌。」《文選．張平子〈歸田賦〉》：「于時曜靈俄景，係以望舒。」

　　「俄」也表示須臾、頃刻之間。如《莊子．大宗師》：「俄而子來有病，喘喘然將死，其妻子環而泣之」《世說新語．文學》：「手不輟筆，俄得七紙，殊可觀。」

　　現代漢語也用作「俄國」或「俄羅斯」的簡稱。

Meaning: russia
Story: Mr. T gets sick of the USA where there are too many misers and goes to Russia to spend money on vodka with people and have a good time.
Kind: both

從「 人 」，「 我 」聲。本義是傾斜。《說文》：「俄，行頃也。从人，我聲。《詩》曰：仄弁之俄。」段玉裁以為無「 行 」字，注：「各本作『行頃』，乃妄加『行』耳。今正。」又《廣雅．釋詁二》：「俄，衺也。」如《詩．小雅．賓之初筵》：「側弁之俄，屢舞傞傞。」鄭玄箋：「俄，傾貌。」《文選．張平子〈歸田賦〉》：「于時曜靈俄景，係以望舒。」 「 俄 」也表示須臾、頃刻之間。如《莊子．大宗師》：「俄而子來有病，喘喘然將死，其妻子環而泣之」《世說新語．文學》：「手不輟筆，俄得七紙，殊可觀。」 現代漢語也用作「俄國」或「俄羅斯」的簡稱。
From " people" to " me" sound. The original meaning is tilt. "Shu Wen": "Russian, Xing are also. From people, my voice. "Poetry" said: "Zheng Bian of Russia." Duan Yucai thought that there is no " Xing" word. It’s just to add "walking" ears. This is right now." And "Guang Ya. Interpretation of the Second": "Russian, 衺 also." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Bin Zhi Chu Yan": "Russia on the side, dances repeatedly." Zheng Xuanjian: "Russian, beautiful appearance." "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi "Guitian Fu": "Yu Shiyao Lingrujing, to Wangshu." " Russia" also means a moment's time. Such as "Zhuangzi. Grand Master: "Oerzi came to be sick, panting and dying, and his wife cried in circles." "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Literature": "The hand does not stop writing, and Russia gets seven pieces of paper, which is extraordinary." Modern Chinese is also used as an abbreviation for "Russia" or "Russia".

Source glyph
Russian
Name meaning
From people to my voice. The original meaning refers to tilt. There are also short-term meanings.
é
I прил. /наречие
1) книжн. неожиданный, внезапный; через короткое время; сразу, в один миг, моментально; внезапно, вдруг, неожиданно
俄雨 внезапный дождь
俄思 нежданная мысль; вдруг подумать
俄顷 через мгновение, вскоре
俄而 в скором времени, вскоре
2) * съехавший вниз; вот-вот грозящий падением; съезжать, сползать
侧弁之俄 а шапка набекрень вот-вот грозит упасть
3) * высокий; взбитый; высоко
俄轩冕杂衣裳 высоки экипажи и шапки, разноцветны одежды у них
II собств.
1) сокр. 俄罗斯 (Россия, российский, русский)
俄土战争 русско-турецкая война
俄中 русско-китайский
俄境 территория России
俄法同盟 франко-русский союз
2) Э (фамилия)
